channel.title: This is Muhtasim Hossain
channel.description: Recent content on This is Muhtasim Hossain

item.title: What I'm up to
item.description: Here’s a list of things I’m currently working on, and hit me up if you want to have a cup of coffee on any of them! Python Crash Course I’m currently on a very short break from teaching Python to beginners. I’ll be back soon! The motivation behind the 7 day course was to give beginners an idea on what goes around in the world of programming to help them better understand the field and make a decision on whether they want to pursue it or not.
